articles.title: Super-resistant mosquitoes in Asia pose growing threat: study - The Jakarta Post - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: Mosquitoes that transmit dengue and other viruses have evolved growing resistance to insecticides in parts of Asia, and novel ways to control them are desperately needed, new research warns.
articles.content:

articles.title: Prebiotic supplementation reduces blood pressure among people with hypertension – Australian trial - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: A high-fibre supplement helped reduce blood pressure among people with hypertension by changing their gut bacteria, a small trial from Australia has reported.
articles.content: The study included 20 people who were given food for three weeks that either contained the high-fibre supplement, a resistant starch called HAMSAB at 40g, or contained a placebo (corn starch or regul… [+3349 chars]
